name: card-key
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Opens doors in the goldenrod city Radio Tower.
short_effect: HS: Opens doors in the Radio Tower. Gen III: Unlocks Silph Co Doors.

flavor_text.black_white: A card key that opens a shutter in the Radio Tower.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A card key that opens a shutter in the Radio Tower.
